alert.note: Alert for Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 10 at 3:27PM CDT until May 13 at 1:35AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Guadalupe River At Victoria affecting Victoria County. For the Guadalupe River...including Victoria...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Guadalupe River At Victoria. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, Fox Road may begin to flood. Water starts backing up in the old river bed at the intersection of Fordyce Road and Old River Road. Timmy``s Crossing begins to flood. Water in the old riverbed will cross under the railroad tracks close to Parsifal and US Business 59, then water will start ponding behind the structures facing Parsifal. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:15 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 17.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 26.2 feet tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Friday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Below are the latest river stages and stage forecasts: Fld Observed Forecasts (4 pm) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Sun Mon Guadalupe River Victoria 21.0 17.4 Wed 3 pm 26.2 19.4 14.3 10.0 8.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/crp.
